Title: Enacts the open driveway act
Summary: Enacts the open driveway act; prohibits the blocking of an alleyway or driveway by one party without the consent of the other, or by another person where the title of real property provides for a common access way; defines the term "blocking".
LawCode: Amd ยง237, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting the Open Driveway Act
